name: Creative Art Exploration
description: Come have some fun in this ultimate creative arts class, which combines both imagination and inspiration from real-world images. We will be inventing imaginary scenes, creating intricate abstract works of art, and making the mundane extraordinary using both drawing and painting techniques. On our journey, we will explore some of the elements and principles of art, which are foundational pillars of a visual arts education. This class aids in the development of visual art skills, which can help pr
